title: Russian Roulette
desc:
Post 2196
- Can only be played on any card with the permission of the one who played that card.
- When you play this card, choose one of the effects to give to the player who gave you permission.
- Discard 2 cards.
- You both discard 1 card of your choice.
- Gain 12 💵
- Gain 1 **Muscle** 💪
- Gain 5 **Shield** 🛡️
- There is a 1/10 chance this card's effect is replaced with **Draw 5 Cards.**
